posts.name: Johnny's Restaurant
posts.note: Johnny's Restaurant is a modern counter serve dishing out traditional Southern eats, including BBQ, plus classic Greek bites.

posts.name: Manci Antique Club
posts.note: Manci Antique Club is an offbeat option with a bar and outdoor seating for po'boys and other Southern-style sandwiches. From what I surmise from their website they have live music some nights. You need to eat the shrimp or seafood po' boy.

posts.name: Sunset Pointe at Fly Creek Marina
posts.note: Sunset Pointe at Fly Creek Marina is a quaint, beachy seafood specialist with outdoor waterfront dining and creative craft cocktails. Order the Eastern Shore Bouillabaisse or the Gulf Snapper Throats (collar).
